feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: WaveNets：非线性周期性波流场重构的物理信息神经网络方法

link.title: WaveNets：非线性周期性波流场重构的物理信息神经网络方法

entry.content: 本文介绍近期团队在《Engineering with computers》期刊上发表的一篇论文，提出了一种的物理信息神经网络模型（命名为WaveNets），可在仅有少量测量数据条件下对非线性周期水波中的旋转流场进行全域重构。更多详细内容参见团队公众号相关推文.
entry.summary: this is a description of our recently published paper

entry.title: Open-source code for mooring analysis
entry.content:
Mathematical modeling and numerical analysis of mooring systems for offshore floating wind turbines, wave energy devices and current energy are topical area recently. To date, there are four fully open-source programs for mooring simulations:

  1. MAP++
  2. MoorDyn
  3. FEAMooring
  4. openmoor

In addition, moody has its API hosted at GitHub along with tutorials and examples while the source code is not yet available.
entry.summary: Mathematical modeling and numerical analysis of mooring systems for offshore floating wind turbines, wave energy devices and current energy are topical area recently. To date, there are four fully open-source programs for mooring simulations:
